message:
With hearts overflowing with love and joy,

We are delighted to invite you to celebrate the union of *Sakshi and Shubham* as they embark on a beautiful new journey together.

Your presence would mean the world to us, turning this joyous occasion into an unforgettable celebration filled with love, laughter, and cherished memories.

✨ *Save the Date* ✨
Please mark your calendars for *1st and 2nd February* and plan your travel in advance.

More details will follow soon!

*Your presence will add a special touch to our celebration, making it even more meaningful and memorable.*

Looking forward to celebrating with you!

Warm regards,
Choudhary Family, Ajmer
